biotools.summary: H-DBAS is a specialized database for human alternative splicing (AS) based on H-Invitational full-length cDNAs. RNA-Seq tag information is correlated to the AS exons and splice junctions. A total of 148,376,598 RNA-Seq tags have been generated from RNAs extracted from cytoplasmic, nuclear and polysome fractions. A comparative genomics viewer allows users can empirically understand the evolutionary turnover of AS.
